A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Knowing well that there will always be unanswered questions\, challenging points and questionable decisions.. I absolutely loved this movie. There is no true definition to the Force. No director will ever fit in all the scenes that audiences demand. Especially in a world where a fandom will never be satisfied. Side by side\, this movie topped all previous Star Wars films. Acting\, direction\, story and more. I get to live in a world Star Wars is on big screens and this movie will help to drive the continuation of that. Truly Magical.
